00001 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00002 //Description: 1. Setup SimpleGeometry geometry and manage associated sensitive detectors
00003 //             2. Communicate with associated sensitive detectors
00004 //Author: Wu Chen(wuchen@mail.ihep.ac.cn)
00005 //Created: 17 Oct, 2012
00006 //Modified: 11, Jan, 2013
00007 //          Support G4Hype, G4TwistedTube
00008 //Comment: about fVerboseLevel:
00009 //         or modifying input card before starting a run.
00010 //         Either way would set verbose of selected sensitive detectors to the same level
00011 //         0:   Only Warnings and Errors
00012 //         1:   Important information
00013 //         >=5: All information
00014 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------//

00045 SimpleGeometrySvc::SimpleGeometrySvc(G4String name, G4String opt )
00046         : MyVGeometrySvc(name, "S") // Use a not-empty opt to stop inherited class from creating new GeometryParameter
00047 {
00048         if ( opt == "" ){//called directly by user. set up parameter class.
00049                 SimpleGeometryParameter *pointer = new SimpleGeometryParameter(name);
00050 //              std::cout<<"======>In SimpleGeometrySvc, new SimpleGeometryParameter at ("<<(void*)pointer<<")!"<<std::endl;
00051                 set_GeometryParameter(pointer);
00052         }
00053 }
00054 
00055 SimpleGeometrySvc::~SimpleGeometrySvc(){
00056         printf("~SimpleGeometrySvc");
00057 }
00058 
00059 //------------------------Modify-------------------------------
00060 void SimpleGeometrySvc::set_GeometryParameter( SimpleGeometryParameter* val ){
00061         m_GeometryParameter = val;
00062         MyVGeometrySvc::set_GeometryParameter(m_GeometryParameter);
00063 }
00064 
00065 //--------------------------SetGeometry----------------------------------
00066 //virtual function
00067 G4VPhysicalVolume* SimpleGeometrySvc::SetGeometry(){
00068         m_GeometryParameter->Dump();
00069         ConstructVolumes();
00070         G4VPhysicalVolume *current = PlaceVolumes();
00071         return current;
00072 }
00073 
00074 //-------------------------Special functions-----------------------------
00075 //=> ConstructVolumes
00076 void SimpleGeometrySvc::ConstructVolumes(){
00077         MyVGeometrySvc::ConstructVolumes();
00078         bool vis;
00079         double r, g, b, t;
00080         std::stringstream buffer;
00081         G4Material* pttoMaterial;
00082 
00083         int nVol = m_GeometryParameter->get_VolNo();
00084         for ( int i_Vol = 0; i_Vol < nVol; i_Vol++ ){
00085                 G4String name, mat_name, SDName; 
00086                 G4String SolidType;
00087                 G4int SolidIndex;
00088                 G4int SRepNo;
00089                 G4int RepNo;
00090                 SolidIndex = m_GeometryParameter->get_SolidIndex(i_Vol);
00091                 SolidType = m_GeometryParameter->get_SolidType(i_Vol);
00092                 name = m_GeometryParameter->get_name(i_Vol);
00093                 SRepNo = m_GeometryParameter->get_SRepNo(i_Vol);
00094                 RepNo = m_GeometryParameter->get_RepNo(i_Vol);
00095                 for ( int i = 0; i < RepNo; i++ ){
00096                         G4VSolid* sol_Vol = 0;
00097                         G4String iname = name;
00098                         if (RepNo>1){
00099                                 buffer.str("");
00100                                 buffer.clear();
00101                                 buffer<<name<<"_"<<i;
00102                                 iname = buffer.str();
00103                         }
00104                         if ( SolidType == "Box" ){
00105                                 G4double halfX, halfY, halfZ;
00106                                 halfX = m_GeometryParameter->get_Box_X(SolidIndex,i)/2;
00107                                 halfY = m_GeometryParameter->get_Box_Y(SolidIndex,i)/2;
00108                                 halfZ = m_GeometryParameter->get_Box_Z(SolidIndex,i)/2;
00109                                 sol_Vol=new G4Box(iname,halfX,halfY,halfZ);
00110                         }
00111                         else if ( SolidType == "EllipticalTube" ){
00112                                 G4double halfX, halfY, halfZ;
00113                                 halfX = m_GeometryParameter->get_EllipticalTube_X(SolidIndex,i)/2;
00114                                 halfY = m_GeometryParameter->get_EllipticalTube_Y(SolidIndex,i)/2;
00115                                 halfZ = m_GeometryParameter->get_EllipticalTube_Z(SolidIndex,i)/2;
00116                                 sol_Vol=new G4EllipticalTube(iname,halfX,halfY,halfZ);
00117                         }
00118                         else if ( SolidType == "Tubs" ){
00119                                 G4double RMax, RMin, halfLength, StartAng, SpanAng;
00120                                 RMax = m_GeometryParameter->get_Tubs_RMax(SolidIndex,i);
00121                                 RMin = m_GeometryParameter->get_Tubs_RMin(SolidIndex,i);
00122                                 halfLength = m_GeometryParameter->get_Tubs_Length(SolidIndex,i)/2;
00123                                 StartAng = m_GeometryParameter->get_Tubs_StartAng(SolidIndex,i);
00124                                 SpanAng = m_GeometryParameter->get_Tubs_SpanAng(SolidIndex,i);
00125                                 sol_Vol=new G4Tubs(iname,RMin,RMax,halfLength,StartAng,SpanAng);
00126                         }
00127                         else if ( SolidType == "Torus" ){
00128                                 G4double RMax, RMin, Rtor, StartAng, SpanAng;
00129                                 RMax = m_GeometryParameter->get_Torus_RMax(SolidIndex,i);
00130                                 RMin = m_GeometryParameter->get_Torus_RMin(SolidIndex,i);
00131                                 Rtor = m_GeometryParameter->get_Torus_Rtor(SolidIndex,i);
00132                                 StartAng = m_GeometryParameter->get_Torus_StartAng(SolidIndex,i);
00133                                 SpanAng = m_GeometryParameter->get_Torus_SpanAng(SolidIndex,i);
00134                                 sol_Vol=new G4Torus(iname,RMin,RMax,Rtor,StartAng,SpanAng);
00135                         }
00136                         else if ( SolidType == "Sphere" ){
00137                                 G4double RMax, RMin, StartPhi, SpanPhi, StartTheta, SpanTheta;
00138                                 RMax = m_GeometryParameter->get_Sphere_RMax(SolidIndex,i);
00139                                 RMin = m_GeometryParameter->get_Sphere_RMin(SolidIndex,i);
00140                                 StartPhi = m_GeometryParameter->get_Sphere_StartPhi(SolidIndex,i);
00141                                 SpanPhi = m_GeometryParameter->get_Sphere_SpanPhi(SolidIndex,i);
00142                                 StartTheta = m_GeometryParameter->get_Sphere_StartTheta(SolidIndex,i);
00143                                 SpanTheta = m_GeometryParameter->get_Sphere_SpanTheta(SolidIndex,i);
00144                                 sol_Vol=new G4Sphere(iname,RMin,RMax,StartPhi,SpanPhi,StartTheta,SpanTheta);
00145                         }
00146                         else if ( SolidType == "Hype" ){
00147                                 G4double innerRadius, outerRadius, halfLength, innerStereo, outerStereo;
00148                                 innerRadius = m_GeometryParameter->get_Hype_innerRadius(SolidIndex,i);
00149                                 outerRadius = m_GeometryParameter->get_Hype_outerRadius(SolidIndex,i);
00150                                 halfLength = m_GeometryParameter->get_Hype_Length(SolidIndex,i)/2;
00151                                 innerStereo = m_GeometryParameter->get_Hype_innerStereo(SolidIndex,i);
00152                                 outerStereo = m_GeometryParameter->get_Hype_outerStereo(SolidIndex,i);
00153                                 sol_Vol=new G4Hype(iname,innerRadius,outerRadius,innerStereo,outerStereo,halfLength);
00154                         }
00155                         else if ( SolidType == "TwistedTubs" ){
00156                                 G4double endinnerrad, endouterrad, halfLength, twistedangle, dphi;
00157                                 twistedangle = m_GeometryParameter->get_TwistedTubs_twistedangle(SolidIndex,i);
00158                                 endinnerrad = m_GeometryParameter->get_TwistedTubs_endinnerrad(SolidIndex,i);
00159                                 endouterrad = m_GeometryParameter->get_TwistedTubs_endouterrad(SolidIndex,i);
00160                                 halfLength = m_GeometryParameter->get_TwistedTubs_Length(SolidIndex,i)/2;
00161                                 dphi = m_GeometryParameter->get_TwistedTubs_dphi(SolidIndex,i);
00162                                 sol_Vol=new G4TwistedTubs(iname,twistedangle,endinnerrad,endouterrad,halfLength,dphi);
00163                         }
00164                         else if ( SolidType == "Cons" ){
00165                                 G4double RMax1, RMin1, RMax2, RMin2, halfLength, StartAng, SpanAng;
00166                                 RMax1 = m_GeometryParameter->get_Cons_RMax1(SolidIndex,i);
00167                                 RMin1 = m_GeometryParameter->get_Cons_RMin1(SolidIndex,i);
00168                                 RMax2 = m_GeometryParameter->get_Cons_RMax2(SolidIndex,i);
00169                                 RMin2 = m_GeometryParameter->get_Cons_RMin2(SolidIndex,i);
00170                                 halfLength = m_GeometryParameter->get_Cons_Length(SolidIndex,i)/2;
00171                                 StartAng = m_GeometryParameter->get_Cons_StartAng(SolidIndex,i);
00172                                 SpanAng = m_GeometryParameter->get_Cons_SpanAng(SolidIndex,i);
00173                                 sol_Vol=new G4Cons(iname,RMin1,RMax1,RMin2,RMax2,halfLength,StartAng,SpanAng);
00174                         }
00175                         else if ( SolidType == "Polycone" ){
00176                                 G4double StartAng, SpanAng;
00177                                 G4int numZ;
00178                                 numZ = m_GeometryParameter->get_Polycone_numZ(SolidIndex,i);
00179                                 G4double *RMax = new G4double[numZ];
00180                                 G4double *RMin = new G4double[numZ];
00181                                 G4double *Z = new G4double[numZ];
00182                                 for ( int j = 0; j < numZ; j++ ){
00183                                         RMax[j] = m_GeometryParameter->get_Polycone_RMax(SolidIndex,j,i);
00184                                         RMin[j] = m_GeometryParameter->get_Polycone_RMin(SolidIndex,j,i);
00185                                         Z[j] = m_GeometryParameter->get_Polycone_Z(SolidIndex,j,i);
00186                                         std::cout<<j<<": RMax = "<<RMax[j]/mm<<"mm, RMin = "<<RMin[j]/mm<<"mm, "<<Z[j]/mm<<"mm"<<std::endl;
00187                                 }
00188                                 StartAng = m_GeometryParameter->get_Polycone_StartAng(SolidIndex,i);
00189                                 SpanAng = m_GeometryParameter->get_Polycone_SpanAng(SolidIndex,i);
00190                                 sol_Vol=new G4Polycone(iname,StartAng,SpanAng,numZ,Z,RMin,RMax);
00191                         }
00192                         else if ( SolidType == "ExtrudedSolid" ){
00193                                 G4int numZ, numP;
00194                                 numZ = m_GeometryParameter->get_ExtrudedSolid_numZ(SolidIndex,i);
00195                                 numP = m_GeometryParameter->get_ExtrudedSolid_numP(SolidIndex,i);
00196                                 std::vector<G4TwoVector> polygon;
00197                                 std::vector<G4ExtrudedSolid::ZSection>    zsections;
00198                                 for ( int j = 0; j < numZ; j++ ){
00199                                         zsections.push_back(G4ExtrudedSolid::ZSection(m_GeometryParameter->get_ExtrudedSolid_Z(SolidIndex,j,i),
00200                                                                              G4TwoVector(m_GeometryParameter->get_ExtrudedSolid_X0(SolidIndex,j,i),
00201                                                                                          m_GeometryParameter->get_ExtrudedSolid_Y0(SolidIndex,j,i)),
00202                                                                              m_GeometryParameter->get_ExtrudedSolid_Scale(SolidIndex,j,i)));
00203                                 }
00204                                 for ( int j = 0; j < numP; j++ ){
00205                                         polygon.push_back(G4TwoVector(m_GeometryParameter->get_ExtrudedSolid_X(SolidIndex,j,i),
00206                                                                               m_GeometryParameter->get_ExtrudedSolid_Y(SolidIndex,j,i)));
00207                                 }
00208                                 sol_Vol=new G4ExtrudedSolid(iname,polygon,zsections);
00209                         }
00210                         else if ( SolidType == "BooleanSolid" ){
00211                                 G4double Ephi = m_GeometryParameter->get_BooleanSolid_Ephi(SolidIndex,i);
00212                                 G4double Etheta = m_GeometryParameter->get_BooleanSolid_Etheta(SolidIndex,i);
00213                                 G4double Epsi = m_GeometryParameter->get_BooleanSolid_Epsi(SolidIndex,i);
00214                                 G4double PosX  = m_GeometryParameter->get_BooleanSolid_PosX(SolidIndex,i);
00215                                 G4double PosY  = m_GeometryParameter->get_BooleanSolid_PosY(SolidIndex,i);
00216                                 G4double PosZ  = m_GeometryParameter->get_BooleanSolid_PosZ(SolidIndex,i);
00217                                 G4RotationMatrix* rot =new G4RotationMatrix(Ephi,Etheta,Epsi);
00218                                 G4ThreeVector trans(PosX ,PosY ,PosZ);
00219                                 G4String type = m_GeometryParameter->get_BooleanSolid_type(SolidIndex);
00220                                 G4String sol_name1 = m_GeometryParameter->get_BooleanSolid_sol1(SolidIndex);
00221                                 G4String sol_name2 = m_GeometryParameter->get_BooleanSolid_sol2(SolidIndex);
00222                                 G4String isol_name1 = sol_name1;
00223                                 G4String isol_name2 = sol_name2;
00224                                 if (RepNo>1){
00225                                         buffer.str("");
00226                                         buffer.clear();
00227                                         buffer<<sol_name1<<"_"<<i;
00228                                         isol_name1 = buffer.str();
00229                                         buffer.str("");
00230                                         buffer.clear();
00231                                         buffer<<sol_name2<<"_"<<i;
00232                                         isol_name2 = buffer.str();
00233                                 }
00234                                 G4SolidStore *pSolidStore = G4SolidStore::GetInstance();
00235                                 G4VSolid *sol1 = pSolidStore->GetSolid(isol_name1);
00236                                 G4VSolid *sol2 = pSolidStore->GetSolid(isol_name2);
00237                                 if (!sol1||!sol2){
00238                                         std::cout<<"ERROR: in SimpleGeometrySvc::ConstructVolumes(), cannot find solids for BooleanSolid \""<<iname<<"\" !!!"<<std::endl;
00239                                         continue;
00240                                 }
00241                                 if ( type == "plus" ){
00242                                         sol_Vol = new G4UnionSolid(iname,sol1,sol2,rot,trans);
00243                                 }
00244                                 else if ( type == "minus" ){
00245                                         sol_Vol = new G4SubtractionSolid(iname,sol1,sol2,rot,trans);
00246                                 }
00247                                 else if ( type == "times" ){
00248                                         sol_Vol = new G4IntersectionSolid(iname,sol1,sol2,rot,trans);
00249                                 }
00250                                 else {
00251                                         std::cout<<"ERROR: in SimpleGeometrySvc::ConstructVolumes(), cannot recognize BooleanSolid type \""<<type<<"\""<<"for \""<<iname<<"\"!!!"<<std::endl;
00252                                         continue;
00253                                 }
00254                         }
00255                         else {
00256                                 std::cout<<"SolidType "<<SolidType<<" is not supported yet!"<<std::endl;
00257                                 G4Exception("SimpleGeometrySvc::ConstructVolumes()",
00258                                                 "InvalidSetup", FatalException,
00259                                                 "unknown SolidType");
00260                         }
00261                         if (m_GeometryParameter->get_SolidBoolean(i_Vol)) continue;
00262                         SDName = m_GeometryParameter->get_SDName(i_Vol);
00263                         mat_name = m_GeometryParameter->get_material(i_Vol);
00264                         pttoMaterial = G4Material::GetMaterial(mat_name);
00265                         //              std::cout<<"name = "<<name
00266                         //                       <<", i_Vol = "<<i_Vol
00267                         //                       <<", SolidType = "<<SolidType
00268                         //                       <<", SolidIndex = "<<SolidIndex
00269                         //                       <<std::endl;
00270                         if (!pttoMaterial){
00271                                 std::cout<<"Material "<<mat_name<<" is not defined!"<<std::endl;
00272                                 G4Exception("SimpleGeometrySvc::ConstructVolumes()",
00273                                                 "InvalidSetup", FatalException,
00274                                                 "unknown material name");
00275                         }
00276                         G4LogicalVolume* log_Vol;
00277                         log_Vol = new G4LogicalVolume(sol_Vol, pttoMaterial, iname,0,0,0);
00278                         G4VSensitiveDetector* aSD;
00279                         aSD = MyDetectorManager::GetMyDetectorManager()->GetSD(iname, SDName, const_cast<SimpleGeometrySvc*>(this) );
00280                         log_Vol->SetSensitiveDetector(aSD);
00281                         //visual
00282                         vis = m_GeometryParameter->get_vis(i_Vol);
00283                         if (!vis){
00284                                 log_Vol->SetVisAttributes(G4VisAttributes::Invisible);
00285                         }
00286                         else{
00287                                 r = m_GeometryParameter->get_r(i_Vol);
00288                                 g = m_GeometryParameter->get_g(i_Vol);
00289                                 b = m_GeometryParameter->get_b(i_Vol);
00290                                 t = m_GeometryParameter->get_t(i_Vol);
00291                                 G4VisAttributes* visAttributes = new G4VisAttributes;
00292                                 visAttributes->SetVisibility(true);
00293                                 visAttributes->SetColour(r,g,b,t);
00294                                 log_Vol->SetVisAttributes(visAttributes);
00295                         }
00296                 }
00297         }
00298 }
00299 
00300 //=>Place Volumes
00301 G4VPhysicalVolume* SimpleGeometrySvc::PlaceVolumes(){
00302         std::stringstream buffer;
00303         G4VPhysicalVolume* world_pvol = 0;
00304         bool checkOverlap = m_GeometryParameter->get_checkoverlap();
00305         int nVol = m_GeometryParameter->get_VolNo();
00306         for ( int i_Vol = 0; i_Vol < nVol; i_Vol++ ){
00307                 if (m_GeometryParameter->get_SolidBoolean(i_Vol)) continue;
00308                 G4double PosX, PosY, PosZ;
00309                 G4String name, motVolName; 
00310                 G4int SRepNo;
00311                 G4int RepNo;
00312                 name = m_GeometryParameter->get_name(i_Vol);
00313 //              std::cout<<"Place \""<<name<<"\""<<std::endl; // to be deleted
00314                 motVolName = m_GeometryParameter->get_MotherName(i_Vol);
00315                 SRepNo = m_GeometryParameter->get_SRepNo(i_Vol);
00316                 RepNo = m_GeometryParameter->get_RepNo(i_Vol);
00317                 G4LogicalVolume* log_container;
00318                 int motRepNo = 1;
00319                 if ( name == "World" ) motRepNo = 1;
00320                 else{
00321                         SimpleGeometryParameter* motPara = MyDetectorManager::GetMyDetectorManager()->GetParaFromVolume(motVolName);
00322                         if (motPara)
00323                                 motRepNo = motPara->get_RepNo(motPara->get_VolIndex(motVolName));
00324                         else{
00325                                 std::cout<<"We can't find parameter pointer!!"<<std::endl;
00326                         }
00327                 }
00328                 for ( int im = 0; im < motRepNo; im++ ){
00329                         if ( name == "World" ) log_container = 0;
00330                         else {
00331                                 G4String imotVolName = motVolName;
00332                                 if (motRepNo>1){
00333                                         buffer.str("");
00334                                         buffer.clear();
00335                                         buffer<<motVolName<<"_"<<im;
00336                                         imotVolName = buffer.str();
00337                                 }
00338                                 log_container = get_logicalVolume(imotVolName);
00339                         }
00340                         for ( int i = 0; i < RepNo; i++ ){
00341                                 G4String iname = name;
00342                                 if (RepNo>1){
00343                                         buffer.str("");
00344                                         buffer.clear();
00345                                         buffer<<name<<"_"<<i;
00346                                         iname = buffer.str();
00347                                 }
00348                                 G4LogicalVolume* log_Vol = get_logicalVolume(iname);
00349                                 PosX  = m_GeometryParameter->get_PosX(i_Vol,i);
00350                                 PosY  = m_GeometryParameter->get_PosY(i_Vol,i);
00351                                 PosZ  = m_GeometryParameter->get_PosZ(i_Vol,i);
00352                                 G4ThreeVector pos(PosX ,PosY ,PosZ);
00353                                 G4double Ephi = m_GeometryParameter->get_Ephi(i_Vol,i);
00354                                 G4double Etheta = m_GeometryParameter->get_Etheta(i_Vol,i);
00355                                 G4double Epsi = m_GeometryParameter->get_Epsi(i_Vol,i);
00356                                 G4RotationMatrix* rotateMatrix=new G4RotationMatrix(Ephi,Etheta,Epsi);
00357                                 if ( name == "World" ) rotateMatrix = 0;
00358                                 G4VPhysicalVolume* phy_Vol =
00359                                         new G4PVPlacement(rotateMatrix,                //rotation
00360                                                         pos,                              //position
00361                                                         log_Vol,                          //its logical volume
00362                                                         name,                             //its name
00363                                                         log_container,                    //its mother volume
00364                                                         false,                            //no boolean operation
00365                                                         i+SRepNo,                                //copy number
00366                                                         checkOverlap);                    //overlaps checking
00367                                 if ( name == "World" ) world_pvol = phy_Vol;
00368                         }
00369                 }
00370         }
00371 //      std::cout<<"Finished!"<<std::endl; // to be deleted
00372         G4VPhysicalVolume *former = MyVGeometrySvc::PlaceVolumes();
00373         if (!world_pvol) world_pvol=former;
00374         return world_pvol;
00375 }
